oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Various record and radio excerpts
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Various recordings of performances featuring Tommy Magness (performer) and other unidentified performers, some on radio station WROV (Roanoke, VA.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tommy Magness
